1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Check data property.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Check
6  ( ropsCheck,
7    consCheckTerm,
8    consDuplicate,
9    consExclude,
10    consDump,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Data.Map                          as Map
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax            as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice  as Rop
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Term     as Rop
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message  as Msg
22
23-- | Implementation of relational operators.
24ropsCheck :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
25ropsCheck = Rop.ropList "check"
26    [ Rop.def consCheckTerm  "check-term [-just /N ... | -has /N ... | -but /N ...]"
27                             "just : . -just | has : . -has | but : . -but"
28    , Rop.def consDump       "dump"                    ""
29    , Rop.def consDuplicate  "duplicate /N ..."        "-term*"
30    , Rop.def consExclude    "exclude /N ... -from R"  "-term* . -from/"
31    ]
32
33
34-- ----------------------  check-term
35
36-- | [check-term -just \/P ...]
37--   [check-term -has \/P ...]
38--   [check-term -but \/N ...]
39consCheckTerm :: C.RopCons c
40consCheckTerm med =
41  case Rop.getTag med of
42    tag | tag "just" -> call relmapCheckTermJust "-just"
43        | tag "has"  -> call relmapCheckTermHas  "-has"
44        | tag "but"  -> call relmapCheckTermBut  "-but"
45        | otherwise  -> B.bug "check-term"
46    where call f a = do ns <- Rop.getTerms med a
47                        Right $ f med ns
48
49relmapCheckTermJust :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
50relmapCheckTermHas  :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
51relmapCheckTermBut  :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
52relmapCheckTermJust med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitCheckTermJust
53relmapCheckTermHas  med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitCheckTermHas
54relmapCheckTermBut  med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitCheckTermBut
55
56relkitCheckTermJust :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
57relkitCheckTermHas  :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
58relkitCheckTermBut  :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
59relkitCheckTermJust = checkTerm "Just" (\ns he1 -> D.headFrom ns `D.headEquiv` he1)
60relkitCheckTermHas  = checkTerm "Has"  (\ns he1 -> D.headFrom ns `D.isSubhead` he1)
61relkitCheckTermBut  = checkTerm "But"  (\ns he1 -> null $ ns `B.snipShare` D.getTermNames he1)
62
63checkTerm :: String -> ([S.TermName] -> D.Head -> Bool) -> [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
64checkTerm _ _ _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
65checkTerm opt check ns (Just he1)
66    | check ns he1 = Right $ C.relkitJust he1 C.RelkitId
67    | otherwise    = Msg.checkTerm opt ns he1
68
69
70-- ----------------------  duplicate
71
72-- $duplicate
73--
74--  Output tuples of which key is duplicated.
75--  Relmap @duplicate@ @\/x@ @\/y@ means
76--  if set of terms @\/x@ and @\/y@ is a key of relation,
77--  there are another tuples that has the same key.
78
79-- | __duplicate \/P ...__
80--
81--   Output tuples duplicate on terms /\/P .../.
82--
83consDuplicate :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
84consDuplicate med =
85  do ns <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
86     Right $ relmapDuplicate med ns
87
88relmapDuplicate :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
89relmapDuplicate med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitDuplicate
90
91relkitDuplicate :: (Ord c) => [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
92relkitDuplicate _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
93relkitDuplicate ns (Just he1)
94    | D.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.unkTerm (D.newTerms pk) he1
95    | otherwise           = Right kit2
96    where
97      pk     = D.termPicker ns he1
98      kit2   = C.relkitJust he1 $ C.RelkitFull False kitf2
99      dup    = not . B.isSingleton
100
101      kitf2 :: (Ord c) => [[c]] -> [[c]]
102      kitf2 bo1 = let bo1map = B.gatherToMap $ map (D.ssRAssoc pk) bo1
103                  in concat $ Map.elems $ Map.filter dup bo1map
104
105
106-- ----------------------  exclude
107
108-- exclude : none ( pick @'all | meet ( @from | pick @'all ))
109
110-- | __exclude \/N ... -from R__
111consExclude :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
112consExclude med =
113  do ns <- Rop.getTerms  med "-term"
114     m  <- Rop.getRelmap med "-from"
115     Right $ relmapExclude med (ns, m)
116
117relmapExclude :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> ([S.TermName], C.Relmap c) -> C.Relmap c
118relmapExclude med (ns, m) = excl where
119    excl = Rop.relmapNone med (pick B.<> meet)
120    pick = Rop.relmapPick med ns
121    meet = Rop.relmapMeet med Nothing (m B.<> pick)
122
123
124-- ----------------------  dump
125
126-- | __dump__
127--
128--   Dump input relation and abort.
129--
130consDump :: (D.CRel c, B.MixShortEncode c) => C.RopCons c
131consDump med = Right $ C.relmapFlow med $ relkitDump
132
133relkitDump :: (D.CRel c, B.MixShortEncode c) => C.RelkitFlow c
134relkitDump Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
135relkitDump (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
136    kit2 = C.relkitJust he1 $ C.RelkitAbFull False kitf2 []
137    kitf2 _ bo1 = Msg.dumpRel $ D.Rel he1 bo1
138
